dict.string: for viewing on iPhone video: 480x320 h.264 at 384kbps audio: aac at 128kbs
for viewing on video iPod video: 320x240 h.264 at 256kbps audio: aac at 128kbs
for viewing on TV hooked up to iPod/iPhone video: 640x480 h.264 at 1500kbps audio: aac at 128kbs
for archival at high quality video: original resolution h.264 at RF18 audio: aac at 256kbps
for archival at medium quality video: original resolution h.264 at RF22 audio: aac at 192kbs
for archival at lower quality video: original h.264 at RF25 audio: aac at 192kbs
for archival at low quality video: original h.264 at 1Mbps audio: aac at 128kbs
for compressing to very small size video: original h.264 at 128kbps audio: aac at 128kbs

for fast encode (lower quality) video: original size DivX (mpeg4) at 1500kbps audio: mp3 at 128kbs
NOTE: *MUST* install a codec (http://perian.org/)

for faster encode (worse quality) video: 640x480 DivX 3 at 3000mbps audio: mp3 at 128kbs
NOTE: *MUST* install a codec (http://perian.org/)
for playback on AppleTV video: 960x540 h.264 at 2Mbps audio: 2-channel aac at 128kbs
for Sony PSP video: 480x272 h.264 at 256kbps audio: aac at 128kbs (put in a folder named VIDEO on your PSP memory stick)
for Sony PS3 video: h.264 at 1.5Mbps; resolution unchanged audio: aac at 128kbs *UNTESTED*
for Microsoft XBOX 360 video: original h.264 at 2Mbps audio: aac at 128kbs *UNTESTED*

YouTube High-Def video: 1280x720 h.264 at 1.5Mbps audio: aac at 192kbs
Note: only YouTube Partners can upload this

for uploading to YouTube video: 640x360 h.264 at 512kbps audio: aac at 128kbs
*MAKE SURE* your video is under 10 minutes

MPEG-2 Program Stream video: original resolution, mpeg-2 at 1Mbps audio: mp2 at 128kbs
May not work in Quicktime
for burning to DVD widescreen NTSC video: 720x480, mpeg2 at 5Mbps (variable <9.8) audio: mp2 at 192kbs
Save the encrypted TiVo file. File can only be used to upload back to TiVo later. (Cannot duplicate Format)
For people who want to listen to the show audio: mp3 at 192kbps
Only to test if a channel works with Program Stream vs TransportStream. (Cannot duplicate Format)
For use w/ channels that already produce H.264 video (e.g. new Comcast). Converts to MP4 container
Higher quality; Resolution same as original; Surround sound
Resolution same as original; Surround sound
720P max res; Surround Sound Compatible with AppleTV 3+, iPad2+; iPhone 4s+; iPod Touch
720P max res; Main 3.1; Surround Sound Compatible with AppleTV 2+; iPad; iPhone 4+; iPod Touch 4
720P max res; Main 3.1; No Surround; No Commercial Skip Compatible with AppleTV 2+; iPad; iPhone 4+; iPod Touch 4
720P max res; Main 3.1; No Surround; No Commercial Skip Compatible with AppleTV 2+; iPad; iPhone 4+; iPod Touch 4
720P max res; No Surround Compatible with AppleTV 3+, iPad2+; iPhone 4s+; iPod Touch
480P; MPEG2; Surround Use with burner software to create DVD
480P; Baseline 3.0; no Surround Should be compatible with all devices and Standard Def TVs
Super high quality H.264 video (up to 1080p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container.
H.264 video (up to 720p30) and AAC stereo audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Android devices.

H.264 video (up to 1080p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Apple iPhone 5, 5S, 6, 6s, and later; iPod touch 6th Generation and later; iPad Pro; iPad Air; iPad 3rd, 4th Generation and later; iPad mini; Apple TV 3rd Generation and later.

H.264 video (up to 720p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Apple iPhone 4 and later; iPod touch 4th, 5th Generation and later; Apple TV 2nd Generation and later.

H.264 video (up to 540p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Apple iPhone 1st Generation, 3G, 3GS, and later; iPod touch 1st, 2nd, 3rd Generation and later; iPod Classic; Apple TV 1st Generation and later.
Very small H.264 video (up to 288p30) and AAC mono audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Apple iPod 5th Generation and later.
H.264 video (up to 1080p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Roku 1080p models.
H.264 video (up to 1080p30), AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with Xbox One.
H.264 video, AAC stereo audio, in an MP4 container. Hardware assisted, very fast, very small, but lower quality. Compatible with Apple iPhone 7 and later; Apple TV 2nd Generation and later.

Hardware assisted, high quality. H.265 10-Bit video, AAC stereo audio, and Dolby Digital (AC-3) surround audio, in an MP4 container. Compatible with iOS 11 Apple iPhone 7 and later; iPad (6th gen) iPad Pro; Apple TV HD and later.
